CustomField.description: Set to true if Casual Business and Description Set - means it is awaiting Establishment in Booking System.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Account_Type__c, 'Casual Business'), ISPICKVAL(Account_Type__c, 'Request for Established')), NOT( ISBLANK(Division__c ) ) ), true, false)
CustomField.label: Request for Establish
